title: Spam... Yum...
content:
I love spam!!! (The food): My day toast slices of it on american cheese, and wheat bread; and it is sooo delicious!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]

BTW - I hate mushrooms [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sick.gif[/img] , but I love [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img] cheese!!! I am from Wisconson; "America's Dairyland."

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Spam... Yum...
content: I don't really care for mushrooms, although they work great with pasta sauce. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]
